string_table.str: The prisoners have escaped! Send the alert!
Run away! Run away!
Whoa!
T
Ooh, I felt that!
Take no prisoners this time!
OOH-RAH!
OOH-RAH!
Free the prisoners
Destroy the power source of the light shield prison to free the prisoners.
OOH-RAH!
There's another abandoned research post up ahead, hopefully we can use equipment there to contact the Spirit of Fire.
OOH-RAH!
OOH-RAH!
Alice, the Spirit of Fire's Archer Missiles are primed for you when you need them.
Archer Missiles are ready for you, Spartan.
The Spirit of Fire's Restoration drones are online for you, Alice.
You're in need of damage control, One-Three-Zero. Make use of the Spirit of Fire's restoration drones.
Isabel has brought Lotus Mines online for you to help hold the line, Alice.
Spartan, Lotus Mines are ready for you to set up defenses against the Banished.
I'll get Isabel to put a briefing package together for you so you can catch up. Good hunting.
There's another abandoned research post up ahead, we can use the equipment there to contact the Spirit of Fire.
You're a sight for sore eyes, Spartan. I thought we'd never see you again.
Almost there, Spartan. I just need you to hold on a little longer.
Isabel! Launch Archer Missiles, now!
Pelicans incoming now, ready your team for extraction!
I
Good to hear from you, Alice. How did you make it out?
Isabel's got your signal and we're sending in Pelicans to extract you. But she's also intercepted enemy chatter. The Banished are heading to your position now.
I
How would you like to cause them more trouble.
Ready your weapons, troops. We're going to get everyone back. It's gonna be a ball.
Spirit of Fire Actual, it's getting pretty busy down here, do we have an ETA on that extraction?
Spirit of Fire Actual, they're throwing everything at us!
Yessir. You heard him, troops, pack it up! Move, move!
That's not going to hold them back, sir!
Close call. Where are we headed next, sir?
Spirit of Fire Actual, this is Alice One-Three-Zero reporting in.
Commandeered an enemy vehicle, sir. I've rescued some of our troops and we're ready to get back in the fight.
We'll hold the line until extraction, sir.
W
Alice, I have turrets ready to deploy to help shore up your defenses.
What are those things?
I
W
Engineers. The Covenant used them for combat support. They're harmless but they can fix just about anything.
Make them your priority targets or they'll heal the Banished faster than we can hurt 'em.
N
We can't call the Spirit of Fire on unsecured channels so we need to take control of the old research post here. Let's roll out.
We've still got more of our people out there, let's go get them back.
Okay, Spartan. Let's get to work.
Jump Pack Brutes! Keep your distance, and if you see them fly, get outta the way before they land!
We're only going to get one shot at a pickup, so let's get everybody before we call for a ride home. Stay close to me and we'll all get out of here together.
That's given us the layout of the prison compound. I've marked our maps with their locations. Let's go get our people back.
More cells up ahead, break them out of there!
Welcome back to the fight, everyone.
Heads up! Looks like we woke the neighbours!
You know the drill team, don't spare the ammo.
Hope you kept that Cyclops armor in good shape.
W
I'm going to disable that shield and get you out of there.
Easy pickings. I can take out those guards with one slam.
Okay, soldiers. Saddle up. We're gonna need those Warthogs.
Only one question, sir. Who are the Banished?
Leader powers are inaccessible until Alice makes contact with the Spirit of Fire.
Alice's Health
Shield Generator
@special_power@ Spartan Slam
Kill units with Archer Missiles
Units killed by Archer Missiles:
Kill units with the Archer Missiles leader power. Select the power in the radial by holding @TutPwrRadial@.
Kill units with Lotus Mines
Units killed with Lotus Mines:
Kill units using the Lotus Mines leader power. Select the power in the radial by holding @TutPwrRadial@.
Kill the scared Grunt before he flees
Don't let the scared Grunt escape your wrath! No mercy!
Kill units using Spartan Slam
Slams executed:
Execute a Spartan Slam by pressing @special_power@.
Hold the line until extraction
Keep Alice alive for the entire mission
Gather all resources
Gathered resources:
Without a base drop from the Spirit of Fire, Alice will need to gather resources from the area.
Don't let prison squads die
Prisoner died
Alice has a limited force to take on the Banished, keep the rescued units alive.
Take control of the research post
Take control of the research post and use it to reestablish contact with the Spirit of Fire.
You have unlocked the Battle Hardened leader power. All units will automatically gain veterancy at 50% faster rate.
To set control groups hold @TutSelUnits@ and use the @D-Pad@ to assign groups.
Cyclops units are heavy anti-vehicle units.
Engineers heal other units. Take them out with ranged units first to maximize your damage.
Hero units, such as Spartans, can deal and take a lot of damage, so use them to your advantage.
Jump Pack Brutes can jump over large distances, delivering a mighty blow when they land, but can be countered by Hellbringers.
Use the Lotus Mines, Archer Missiles and Restoration Drones leader powers provided by the Spirit of Fire to fight off the Banished attack.
Select Alice and Press @special_power@ to attack with Spartan Slam
Press @special_power@ to use the Warthog's special ability to ram enemies.
